entry.title: RUST-RL does /r/roguelikedev follows the complete tutorial, week 3
entry.summary: data-driven entities, input handling, and a brief overview of each of the main procgen techniques implemented so far and how they work

entry.title: RUST-RL does /r/roguelikedev follows the complete tutorial, week 2
entry.summary: better wall bitmasks, and a step-by-step look at how modular builders can be chained together for more varied maps
